definitions.definition: an object that one need not, cannot, or does not wish to give a specific name to.
examples: look at that metal rail thing over there
synonyms: dingus "the room was full of strange things"

definitions.definition: personal belongings or clothing.
examples: she began to unpack her things
synonyms: junk; goods and chattels "I'll come back tomorrow to collect my things"

definitions.definition: objects, equipment, or utensils used for a particular purpose.
examples: they cleared away the last few lunch things

definitions.definition: anything (used for emphasis).
examples: noun: a thing

definitions.definition: used to express one's disapproval or contempt for something.
examples: you won't find me smoking those filthy things

definitions.definition: all that can be described in the specified way.
examples: his love for all things Italian

definitions.definition: used euphemistically to refer to a man's penis.
an inanimate material object as distinct from a living sentient being.
examples: I'm not a thing, not a work of art to be cherished

definitions.definition: a living creature or plant.
examples: the sea is the primal source of all living things on earth

definitions.definition: used to express and give a reason for one's pity, affection, approval, or contempt for a person or animal.
examples: have a nice weekend in the country, you lucky thing!

definitions.definition: an action, activity, event, thought, or utterance.
examples: she said the first thing that came into her head
synonyms: chore "I've got several things to do today"thought
preoccupation "I've got other things on my mind just now"remark
pronouncement "I keep remembering things he said"incident
phenomenon "quite a few odd things happened"

definitions.definition: circumstances, conditions, or matters that are unspecified.
examples: things haven't gone entirely according to plan

definitions.definition: an abstract entity, quality, or concept.
examples: mourning and depression are not the same thing
synonyms: quirk More"one of the things I like about you is your optimism"fact
factor "there's another thing you should know"

definitions.definition: an example or type of something.
examples: the game is the latest thing in family fun

definitions.definition: a situation or activity of a specified type or quality.
examples: noun: a thing

definitions.definition: a romantic or sexual relationship.
examples: Phil and Lisa had been having a thing

definitions.definition: an established or genuine phenomenon or practice (typically used in expressions registering surprise or incredulity).
examples: according to media reports, sleep texting is now a thing among serious smartphone addicts

definitions.definition: what is needed or required.
examples: you need a tonicâ€“and here's just the thing

definitions.definition: what is socially acceptable or fashionable.
examples: it wouldn't be quite the thing to go to a royal garden party in boots

definitions.definition: one's special interest or concern.
examples: reading isn't my thing
synonyms: what interests one; Moreinformalone's cup of tea
what turns one on "books aren't really my thing"

definitions.definition: used to introduce or emphasize an important point.
examples: the thing is, I am going to sell this house
synonyms: I'm not sure if it's what I want"
